entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Ivujivik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:55 AM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ivujivik Airport 05:00 AM EST Saturday 21 January 2023
Temperature: -11.9°C
Pressure: 99.5 kPa
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -23
Dewpoint: -13.8°C
Wind: SSW 40 km/h gust 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending near noon then snow and local blowing snow. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature falling to minus 24 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 24 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 36 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 21 January 2023
